00050 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00051 /// CTreeTraceView::CTreeTraceView
00052 ///
00053 /// @description    This is the constructor of the CTreeTraceView class. It uses
00054 ///                 parent to continue in creating the QObject tree.
00055 /// @pre            None
00056 /// @post           The default values for the stored trace, and style are set
00057 ///                 and the CTreeSelector is initialized and connected to the
00058 ///                 retrace() slot.
00059 ///
00060 /// @param parent:  This is a pointer to the parent QObject.
00061 ///
00062 /// @limitations    None
00063 ///
00064 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00065 CPuzzleTraceView::CPuzzleTraceView( QWidget *parent )
00066 : QTableWidget( parent )
00067 {
00068     m_trace = NULL;
00069     m_style = CStyleToolkit::instance();
00070 
00071     //The m_selector encapsulates all the editables in the tool bar that have to
00072     //do with the trace. AI Selector, Depth, and QS Depth. Any changes to those
00073     //three will emit the activiated() signal.
00074     m_selector = new CPuzzleTracerSelector( this );
00075     connect( m_selector, SIGNAL(activated()), this, SLOT( retrace() ) );
00076 }
00077 
00078 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00079 /// CTreeTraceView::~CTreeTraceView
00080 ///
00081 /// @description  This is the destructor for the CTreeTraceView class which
00082 ///               frees up dynamically allocated memory.
00083 /// @pre          None
00084 /// @post         The trace is deleted if it exists.
00085 ///
00086 /// @limitations  None
00087 ///
00088 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00089 CPuzzleTraceView::~CPuzzleTraceView()
00090 {
00091     if ( m_trace != NULL )
00092         delete m_trace;
00093 }

00162 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00163 /// CTreeGraphView::retrace
00164 ///
00165 /// @description  This function is a Qt slot. Calling it will update the trace
00166 ///               to reflect the current states of the Graph Model and the
00167 ///               Trace Selector.
00168 /// @pre          None
00169 /// @post         The trace is updated and repainted.
00170 ///
00171 /// @limitations  None
00172 ///
00173 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00174 void CPuzzleTraceView::retrace()
00175 {
00176     //Delete any existing trace
00177     if( m_trace != NULL )
00178         delete m_trace;
00179 
00180     //Perform the actual trace
00181     m_trace = m_selector->trace( m_graphModel );
00182 
00183     //Get the string grid
00184     QList<QStringList> lines = gridFromTrace( m_trace );
00185     int rows = lines.count();
00186     int columns = m_trace->s_columnNames.count();
00187 
00188     //Update the table parameters
00189     setColumnCount(columns);
00190     setHorizontalHeaderLabels( m_trace->s_columnNames );
00191     setRowCount(rows);
00192 
00193     //For loop through the 2d array of QStrings
00194     QTableWidgetItem *item;
00195     int i,j;
00196     for( i = 0; i < rows; ++i )
00197         for( j = 0; j < columns; ++j )
00198         {
00199             //create the item, set the text, set the font, plug it in.
00200             item = new QTableWidgetItem(lines[i][j]);
00201             item->setFont( m_style->getFont() );
00202             setItem( i, j, item );
00203         }
00204 
00205     //Resize all the columns to be just the right width
00206     for( j = 0; j < columns; ++j )
00207         resizeColumnToContents(j);
00208 }
00209 
00210 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00211 /// CTreeGraphView::gridFromCall
00212 ///
00213 /// @description          This is a recursive function that returns a 2d array
00214 ///                       of QStrings that represents the trace from the call.
00215 /// @pre                  None
00216 /// @post                 The grid is returned.
00217 ///
00218 /// @param call:          This is the call to be converted to a grid of strings.
00219 ///
00220 /// @return QList<QStringList>: This is the 2d array of QString
00221 ///
00222 /// @limitations          None
00223 ///
00224 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00225 QList<QStringList> CPuzzleTraceView::gridFromCall( SPuzzleCall *call )
00226 {
00227     QList<QStringList> lineGrid;
00228 
00229     IPuzzleLine *curLine;
00230     foreach( curLine, call->s_lines )
00231         lineGrid += curLine->toStringList();
00232     //lineGrid.last().append("");
00233 /*
00234     SPuzzleCall *curCall;
00235     foreach( curCall, call->s_children )
00236         lineGrid += gridFromCall( curCall );
00237 */
00238     return lineGrid;
00239 }
00240 
00241 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00242 /// CPuzzleTraceView::gridFromTrace
00243 ///
00244 /// @description          This function returns a 2d array of QStrings that
00245 ///                       represents the trace.
00246 /// @pre                  None
00247 /// @post                 The grid is returned.
00248 ///
00249 /// @param trace:         This is the trace to be converted to a grid of strings.
00250 ///
00251 /// @return QList<QStringList>: This is the 2d array of QString
00252 ///
00253 /// @limitations          None
00254 ///
00255 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00256 QList<QStringList> CPuzzleTraceView::gridFromTrace( SPuzzleTrace *trace )
00257 {
00258     QList<QStringList> stringGrid;
00259 
00260     QStringList blankLine;
00261     QStringList commentLine;
00262     for( int i = trace->s_columnNames.count(); i > 0; --i )
00263         blankLine.append("");
00264 
00265     commentLine = blankLine;
00266 
00267     SPuzzleCall *rootCall;
00268     foreach( rootCall, trace->s_depths )
00269     {
00270         stringGrid += gridFromCall( rootCall );
00271         commentLine.last() = rootCall->s_comment;
00272         stringGrid += commentLine;
00273         stringGrid += blankLine;
00274     }
00275     if( !stringGrid.isEmpty() )
00276         stringGrid.takeLast();
00277 
00278     return stringGrid;
00279 }
00280 
00281 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00282 /// CTreeGraphView::saveTrace
00283 ///
00284 /// @description  Saves the trace to a latex formatted table in a new file.
00285 /// @pre          None
00286 /// @post         The trace grid is converted to latex format and saved into a
00287 ///               .tex plain text file.
00288 ///
00289 /// @limitations  None
00290 ///
00291 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00292 void CPuzzleTraceView::saveTrace()
00293 {
00294     if( m_trace == NULL )
00295         return;
00296 
00297     QSettings settings;
00298 
00299     //Get the save file name from the user.
00300     QString saveFileName( QFileDialog::getSaveFileName(this,
00301             "Save to LaTeX...",
00302             settings.value( "filepath" ).toString(),
00303             "LaTeX files (*.tex)" ) );
00304 
00305     //Make sure the file was valid.
00306     if (saveFileName.isEmpty())
00307         return;
00308 
00309     //Append the file extension if the user didn't add it themselves.
00310     if ( !saveFileName.endsWith(".tex", Qt::CaseInsensitive ) )
00311         saveFileName.append( ".tex" );
00312 
00313     //Open the file and exit if the file didn't open.
00314     QFile file(saveFileName);
00315     file.open(QIODevice::WriteOnly);
00316     if( !file.isOpen() )
00317     {
00318         QMessageBox::critical(this, "Error", "Could not open file for writing." );
00319         return;
00320     }
00321     QTextStream stream(&file);
00322 
00323     //Style
00324     QString rowEnd(" \\\\ \n");
00325     QString rowSeparator("\\hline ");
00326     QStringList collumns = m_trace->s_columnNames;
00327     collumns.pop_back();
00328 
00329     // \begin{tabluar}{l|l|l|l|l}
00330     SPuzzleCall *curDepth;
00331     foreach(curDepth, m_trace->s_depths)
00332     {
00333         stream <<"\\begin{tabular}{l";
00334         for( int i = columnCount(); i > 2; --i )
00335             stream<<"|l";
00336         stream<<"}\n";
00337 
00338         // open &eval &stuff...
00339         QString output = collumns.join( "\t&" );
00340 
00341         //output.replace( "a,B", "$\\alpha,\\beta$" );
00342 
00343         stream<<output;
00344         stream<<rowEnd;
00345 
00346         // All the lines
00347         QList<QStringList> grid = gridFromCall(curDepth);
00348         QStringList curLine;
00349         foreach( curLine, grid )
00350         {
00351             // If the first and second cells are empty then consider it a depth
00352             // seperation in the grid.
00353             if( curLine[0].isEmpty() && curLine[1].isEmpty() )
00354                 stream<<rowSeparator;
00355             else
00356             {
00357                 if( !curLine[0].isEmpty() )
00358                     stream<<rowSeparator;
00359                 stream<<rowSeparator<<"\n";
00360                 //QString comment = curLine.last();
00361 
00362                 while( curLine.size() >= columnCount() )
00363                    curLine.pop_back();
00364                 output = curLine.join( "\t&" );
00365                 output.replace( "-INF", "$-\\infty$");
00366                 output.replace( "INF", "$\\infty$");
00367 
00368                 // Change [...] to <...>
00369                 output.replace( "[", "<" );
00370                 output.replace( "]", ">" );
00371 
00372                 // Change {...} to [...]
00373                 output.replace( "{", "[" );
00374                 output.replace( "}", "]" );
00375 
00376                 // Change <...> to \framebox{...}
00377                 output.replace( "<", "\\framebox{" );
00378                 output.replace( ">", "}" );
00379 
00380     output.replace( "\\", "\\\\" );
00381     output.replace( "&", "\&" );
00382              output.replace( "%", "\%" );
00383 
00384                 //ifoutput.append( "goal found;", "goal found;" );
00385 
00386                 // Push it to the file and end the line/row
00387                 stream<<output;
00388                 stream<<rowEnd;
00389             }
00390         }
00391         stream<<"\n\\hline\n\\end{tabular}\n\n" << curDepth->s_comment
00392               << "\\\\\\\\ \n";
00393     }
00394 
00395 }

00397 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00398 /// CTreeGraphView::setGraphModel
00399 ///
00400 /// @description  This is a setter for the Graph Model that is traced.
00401 /// @pre          None
00402 /// @post         The graph model is set to model and a retrace is issued.
00403 ///
00404 /// @param model: This is the new model.
00405 ///
00406 /// @limitations  None
00407 ///
00408 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00409 void CPuzzleTraceView::setGraphModel( CPuzzleGraphModel *model )
00410 {
00411     m_graphModel = model;
00412     connect( model, SIGNAL(changed()), this, SLOT(retrace()) );
00413     retrace();
00414 }
